data.persona: I hate being a chambermaid! All I do is clean and do m'ilords bidding. Well, next time he fancies a wash when he's drunk - I'll send him to the stables for one.
data.description:
You are in the King's Bedroom.
The more-than-king-sized bed is the dominating feature of this room.  It has four tall posters, draped in the most royal blue canopy that you could imagine.  The inner curtains of the canopy are made of the finest silk his artisans could get their hands on.  Next to the bed is a lavish desk piled high with books.  On the other side of the room is a fireplace and a chair, and yet another pile of books.  [The King is an avid, AVID reader.]
There's a shelf, a more-than-king-sized bed, a chair,, two books, a desk, an a rabbit fur coverlet, and a royal blue canopy here.
The the queen is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to finish making the bed and tidying up the room so the queen will leave me alone.
data.mid_motivation: The sooner I am done turning over this room, the faster I can get home.
data.long_motivation: I would like to tell the queen about how the king inappropriately flirts with me one day.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the king's bedroom after finishing the master hall.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: use a pile of books by pushing them with the fireplace poker to hide the pile of ash on the floor from the queen.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal a Shakespeare novel  from the king for no reason other than to spite him.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use the coverlet  with the Shakespeare book to hide that it is in my possession.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the queen throughout the room, doing her bidding and completing chores until it is time to leave.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go back to your chambers after a hard day's work and read the king's book, unbeknownst to anyone.
